Features:
No recoded to a lower bitrate
Deleted cache base cities (now the game is creating itself (as for dop.gorodov) based gameplay)
Have all the official add-ons and catalogs of September 4, 2012
Installed the full pack of additional content from the official "Sims Store" as of September 2, 2012 (thanks TeMochkiN). Installation - optional.
Five exclusive additional cities Lunar Lakes, Hidden Springs, Riverview, Barnacle Bay and Sanli Tides
As part of The Sims Store unlocked premium content for The Sims 3: Show Business (Katy Perry Edition + Origin pre-order) and bonus career for The Sims 3: Ambitions
Game Version
Installation time ~ 20-25 minutes.
